attributes.description:
Our most loved SUV just got BREZZA! The Vitara Brezza GL S-Edition is perfect for all those customer’s who want to stand out from the crowd! Additional features include 16” Alloy Wheels, Front Bumper Garnish, Rear Bumper Garnish, Side Skid Plates, Door Visors, Front Grille “Carbon Fiber” Inserts, Interior Styling Kit in “Uber Life Silver’ and Stainless steel door sill guards. Owning a Vitara has never been Brezza. Book your test drive today to experience the all new Vitara Brezza S-Edition. LIMITED STOCK AVAILABLE

This beautiful SUV comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 4 year / 60000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.
